description:
Ok, so Robert looks amazingly nervous in this video. It's almost like he can't believe it was happening.
If you like your boys really unsure about the whole thing, then this video will turn you completely on.
But I have to admit, Robert's dick gave him away, as Zack's cock sucking skills kept him totally charged up and ready to bust through out most of the video.
I even left an outtake in so you would know that he was ok with it all.
Robert just wasn't sure what to do, but half way through the shoot he reached out on his own (no direction from me..I swear! I actually missed him going for the "reach) and started to play with Zack's dick.
Which was weird for him, cuz not only was it another dude's dick, but it was uncut so he was doubly unsure what to do with it.
I thought after the shoot that I had pushed Robert's boundaries as far as they would go, but ironically he volunteered that though he was nervous, his dick liked it and that he would try doing something else with a guy.
Hopefully he wont be as nervous (or maybe that is a good thing)
I'm so glad to have Zack as part of the team. He's so good with the straight guys, and brings out the best in them!
title: Robert & Zack Randall - Serviced
